Michael Douglas has a rather unorthodox way of getting closer to his children – by urinating in public with them.

The actor, 75, said he was having a "bonding" session with his teenage son Michael, 19, by peeing on what looks like the side of the road.

In a snap posted to his Instagram account, Michael and Dylan, who the A-lister shares with Catherine Zeta Jones, face away from the camera as they relieve themselves.

They're even wearing matching clothes, with the duo twinning in black tops, bottoms and trainers.

Michael captioned the tongue in cheek photo: "Bonding experience with my son @dylan__douglas."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Getty)

The cheeky post left his Instagram followers in stitches.

One commented: "The family that pees together sticks together."

"Like father... like son," another posted.

A third wrote: "When u gotta go U gotta go. It’s a guy thing."

(Image: X90045)

"That's something you don't see every day! Thanks for sharing." another posted.

Michael also shares daughter Carys Zeta Douglas, 16, with wife Catherine, 50.

He also has Cameron Douglas, 40, from his first marriage to Diandra Luker.

Cameron recently claimed his dad asked him to hand out joints at celebrity parties when he was just a kid.

(Image: Getty Images)

He made the shock revelation in his new book that lifts the lid on their tumultuous relationship..

Cameron revealed: "Dad would say: 'Hey, bring this over to your uncle' and I would, not realising until years later what it had been.

"As I got older, I would creep from house to house on the compound, climbing balconies and seeing more than I was supposed to: beautiful grown-ups doing the things that beautiful grown-ups living lives of excess do."
